tools.name: get_resource
tools.description: Retrieve specific resource details by ID or list all resources using filters such as name, labels, or type. Works with APISIX-MCP to manage API configurations efficiently.
tools.instructions: Get resource details by ID or list all resources
tools.jsonSchema: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": { "id": { "description": "resource id", "type": "string" }, "labels": { "additionalProperties": { "type": "string" }, "description": "filter labels", "type": "object" }, "name": { "description": "filter name", "type": "string" }, "page": { "default": 1, "description": "page number", "type": "number" }, "page_size": { "default": 50, "description": "page size", "maximum": 500, "minimum": 10, "type": "number" }, "type": { "description": "resource type", "enum": [ "routes", "services", "upstreams", "consumers", "ssls", "consumer_groups", "plugin_configs", "global_rules", "stream_routes", "protos", "plugin_configs" ], "type": "string" }, "uri": { "description": "filter uri", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "type" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: delete_resource
